objects.specification: A wide floor surface spanning the entire room, featuring a primitive textured finish combining earthy greens and browns reminiscent of a dinosaur habitat floor. The surface has subtle irregularities and gentle mottling to suggest natural stone or ancient clay, with faint fossil-like patterns embedded in the texture. The floor has a low gloss sheen that softly reflects light from the ceiling fixtures.

Tall vertical planar walls painted in a primitive style with deep green and muted brown tones, evoking an ancient forest environment. The surface is slightly rough with a plaster-like texture and subtle color variation, as if hand-painted with natural pigments. Each wall has a solid, continuous expanse without decorative details beyond its earthy finish.

Tall vertical planar walls painted in a primitive style with deep green and muted brown tones, evoking an ancient forest environment. The surface is slightly rough with a plaster-like texture and subtle color variation, as if hand-painted with natural pigments. Each wall has a solid, continuous expanse without decorative details beyond its earthy finish.

The surface is slightly rough with a plaster-like texture and subtle color variation, as if hand-painted with natural pigments. Each wall has a solid, continuous expanse without decorative details beyond its earthy finish.

A sturdy rectangular teacher's desk crafted from dark-toned wood with a smooth matte finish. It features a thick tabletop supported by solid legs, with subtle wear marks at the edges and a slightly darker complementary stain to distinguish it from student furniture. The desk conveys a sense of durability and authority, with a simple, functional design.

A comfortable teacher's chair with a high backrest and padded seat upholstered in a dark earth tone fabric. The chair has a sturdy frame, four legs, and subtle cushioning contours. The overall design balances ergonomic support with a primitive wood-and-fabric look.

A large rectangular blackboard with a thin wooden frame in a dark finish. The writing surface is matte and deep charcoal in color, suitable for chalk. A narrow chalk tray runs along the bottom edge framed by the same dark wood, giving it a classic schoolroom appearance.

A cylindrical waste bin constructed from durable gray plastic with a smooth surface. The bin has a slightly tapered form, open at the top without a lid, and subtle ribbing or texture for grip. Its neutral tone integrates unobtrusively into the classroom environment.

A compact rectangular student desk made from light brown and beige wood tones with a gentle wood grain pattern. The tabletop is flat and smooth, with slightly rounded corners and a modest thickness suggesting solid craftsmanship. The overall design is utilitarian and uniform across all student desks, offering a warm, fossil-inspired aesthetic.

A simple student chair featuring a wooden frame with a contoured seat and backrest in matching light brown and beige tones. The chair has four slender legs and a slightly curved back for basic support. The finish is consistent with the fossil-inspired palette, offering a warm, uniform appearance across all student seating.

A life-size dinosaur skeleton model assembled from articulated bone replicas in pale off-white, supported by slender metal stands. The bones are detailed with realistic surface texture and subtle weathering, arranged to mirror the posture of a predator, with elongated skull, rib cage, and vertebral column fully displayed. The overall effect is scientifically accurate yet stylized for indoor display.

A simple wall-mounted wooden shelf unit with multiple tiers, crafted from light brown wood with a primitive finish. Each shelf has a flat surface supported by vertical side panels, with visible grain texture and modest thickness. The shelves are designed to hold small dinosaur toys and decorative items.

A simple wall-mounted wooden shelf unit with multiple tiers, crafted from light brown wood with a primitive finish. Each shelf has a flat surface supported by vertical side panels, with visible grain texture and modest thickness. The shelves are designed to hold small dinosaur toys and decorative items.

Each shelf has a flat surface supported by vertical side panels, with visible grain texture and modest thickness. The shelves are designed to hold small dinosaur toys and decorative items.

A tall freestanding bookshelf made from medium-toned wood with a matte finish. The unit has multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with various book spines in earth-tone covers. The frame is sturdy with a simple rectangular profile and visible wood grain, offering a rustic primitive aesthetic.

A dinosaur-themed educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring vibrant illustrations of prehistoric creatures and informative charts. Each poster is bordered by a thin wooden frame in a light finish, emphasizing the central imagery. The content includes labeled diagrams and stylized art to engage young learners.

A large rectangular window with clear glass panes set within a slender wooden frame painted in a muted green tone. The glazing is transparent with slight reflections, and the frame has simple mullions dividing the glass into sections. The window design is functional and minimalistic.

A fabric curtain panel hanging beside the window, made from medium-weight material patterned with primitive green and brown motifs. The curtain has gentle folds and a matte finish, draping softly and adding a warm, natural accent to the wall opening.

A circular analog wall clock with a thin frame in a weathered bronze tone. The face is off-white with simple black hour marks and hands, and subtle tribal-inspired decorative elements around the rim. The clock has a low-profile design, blending functionality with thematic style.

A potted plant featuring broad, glossy green leaves sprouting from slender stems, set in a terracotta pot with a rustic texture. The foliage is lush and vibrant, providing a natural accent. The pot has a simple cylindrical form with slight weathering.

A cylindrical waste bin constructed from durable gray plastic with a smooth surface. The bin has a slightly tapered form, open at the top without a lid, and subtle ribbing or texture for grip. Its neutral tone integrates unobtrusively into the classroom environment.

A square recessed ceiling light fixture with a simple frame in a matte off-white finish. The diffuser panel is slightly frosted, emitting a soft warm white glow. The fixture integrates flush with the ceiling, offering uniform illumination without ornate details.
